settings.title: Settings
history.empty_message: Your automation runs will appear here once you start executing tasks.
pricing.subtitle: Start automating your workflows today with our flexible pricing options
pricing.trial_info: All paid plans include a 14-day free trial.
pricing.faq_trial_q: How does the free trial work?
pricing.faq_trial_a: All paid plans come with a 14-day free trial.
pricing.faq_change_a: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
pricing.faq_after_q: What happens after my trial ends?
pricing.faq_after_a: Your account will be upgraded to the paid plan unless cancelled.
pricing.cta_subtitle: Join thousands of businesses saving time and money with EasyFlow
dashboard.no_recent: No recent activity. Create a new task to get started!
dashboard.title: Business Automation Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Streamline your business processes with intelligent automation
reset.heading: Password reset / sign-in
reset.intro: We received a password reset request. This page gives you control over when to continue into the app. Click Continue to sign in using the token that was embedded in the link.
reset.notice: If you didn't request this, please change your password after signing in or contact support.
contact.title: Contact Support
contact.intro: If you need help please call or email:
landing.lead: Transform your business with intelligent RPA automation. Streamline workflows, reduce manual tasks, and boost productivity with our powerful automation platform.
landing.feature_intelligent_text: Advanced RPA technology that learns and adapts to your business processes, making automation smarter and more efficient.
landing.feature_fast_text: Execute complex tasks in seconds, not hours. Our optimized automation engine delivers results at incredible speed.
landing.feature_security_text: Bank-level security with encrypted data transmission, secure authentication, and compliance with industry standards.
onboarding.step1.title: Welcome to EasyFlow!
onboarding.step1.description: Let's get you set up with automated business processes.
onboarding.step1.body: EasyFlow helps you automate repetitive business tasks, saving you time and reducing errors.
onboarding.step1.benefit3: Schedule tasks to run when you need them
onboarding.step2.title: Create Your First Task
onboarding.step2.description: Tasks are the core of EasyFlow - let's explore what they can do.
onboarding.step2.type_web_text: Extract data from websites, fill forms, monitor changes
onboarding.step2.type_doc_text: Process PDFs, extract text, generate reports
onboarding.step2.type_api_text: Connect different services and sync data
onboarding.step3.title: Set Up Your Preferences
onboarding.step3.description: Customize EasyFlow to work best for your business.
onboarding.step4.title: You're All Set!
onboarding.step4.description: Welcome emails are on their way to help you get started.
onboarding.step4.congrats: Congratulations! You've completed the onboarding process.
onboarding.step4.next_email: Check your email ({email}) for getting started guides
onboarding.step4.next_join: Join our community for tips and best practices
onboarding.step4.need_help_text: Our support team is here to help you succeed. Reach out anytime!
